title: (x) (Extremely) condensed movie poster credits - various {Yves, Nick Curtis}
content:
[http://www.jd.gosling.btinternet.co.uk/graphics/waroftheworldsposter3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070318050518/http:/www.jd.gosling.btinternet.co.uk/graphics/waroftheworldsposter3.jpg)

Many films use it i think, what font in particular is this?

Cheers!
author: cuidado

comments.content: [This font](http://web.archive.org/web/20070318050518/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/major-production-nf/) was developed specifically for producing movie poster credits as shown. Additionally, it contains logos for MPAA ratings, as well as various video and digital sound system formats.
